attributes.action: Provide a safe route for any Ukranian citizen to claim asylum
attributes.additional_details: Basic human decency argues that this is something we must do. Any help that the people of Ukraine need, we should offer.
attributes.background: The home office must allow any Ukranian citizen who wishes it to claim asylum in the UK. There must be a safe legal route which is easy for Ukranian citizens to follow

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
